pr_title: build: temporarily suppress deprecation warnings for RETIRES config

timeline.message: build: remove use of deprecated config
build: temporarily deprecate build failures while we look into upgrading
build: temporarily deprecate build failures while we look into upgrading

timeline.bodyText: Why are you reducing retries from MAX_VALUE to 10? Are you trying to bound the test time in case of failure? Instead of reducing retries you should set delivery.timeout.ms for this case.
timeline.author: mjsax
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -246,6 +246,7 @@ public String bootstrapServers(final SecurityProtocol securityProtocol) {
    *
    * @return base set of producer properties.
    */
+  @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")

timeline.bodyText: Similar to above: are you trying to bound the test runtime in case of failure? If admin client you should set default.api.timeout.ms instead of retries for this case.
timeline.author: mjsax
